TopicTitle: Celestia University of Geography and Pyrotechnics

Articles.Content:
Yes, I know this has been done before. But that thread is dead and gone. With the new biomes, I figured we need to do this again. So, let's take a new look at Kerbin.

UNIVERSITY OF GEOGRAPHY AND PYROTECHICS

Dedicated to the creation of a map of Kerbin.

First things first, a blank map of Kerbin. Do we have a map of Kerbin that's no more than 1000 pixels wide?

I'd say a good place to start is the Universe Replacer reddit, which lists a ton of other peoples maps and textures for planets and moons. Tingle has a good one of Kerbin that has no clouds - its 8k but can be easily reduced down.

I'd be warey of using his work and redistributing it though, probably best to PM him and ask
